appetizers.title: Hummus, veggies, and pita
appetizers.description: Choose from regular or red pepper hummus with house veggies and wheat or white pita bread

appetizers.title: Potato Chips
appetizers.description: Choose from BBQ, salt and vinegar, or regular kettle style potato chips

appetizers.title: Jalapeno Poppers
appetizers.description: Fried brussel sprouts filled with our house mix of Jalapenos and cream cheese

deli sandwiches.title: Italian Sub
deli sandwiches.description: provolone cheese, salami, capacola, onions, lettuce, dijon mustard, mayonaise, italian seasoning on fresh subs baked daily

deli sandwiches.title: Roast Beef
deli sandwiches.description: Cold cut roast beef, smoked gouda, house dressing

deli sandwiches.title: Chicken Salad Sandwich
deli sandwiches.description: Chicked, sliced fuji apple, sliced celery mixed with mayo and your choice of cheese

deli sandwiches.title: Tuna Sandwich
deli sandwiches.description: Smoked gouda, house tuna mix with veggies and mayo

deli sandwiches.title: Veggie Sandwich
deli sandwiches.description: Your choice of cheese, basil, avocado, bell pepper, house dressing, cucumber, sprouts. +.50 to add egg.

paninis/hot sandwiches.title: Salmon Wrap
paninis/hot sandwiches.description: Salmon on a spinach wrap with house dressing and veggie mix.

paninis/hot sandwiches.title: Italian Panini
paninis/hot sandwiches.description: Salami, capacola, provolone, dijon, lettuce, tomato, onion. Panini or toasted.

paninis/hot sandwiches.title: Cuban
paninis/hot sandwiches.description: Classic cuban sandwich with house dressing. Panini or toasted

paninis/hot sandwiches.title: Tuna Melt
paninis/hot sandwiches.description: Classic tuna melt with house mix of veggies. Panini or toasted.

paninis/hot sandwiches.title: Spicy Chicken Melt
paninis/hot sandwiches.description: Special spicy dressing, smoked gouda, with lettuce. Panini or toasted.
Your choice of cheese, basil, avocado, bell pepper, house dressing, cucumber, and sprouts, toasted or grilled on panini maker. +.50 to add egg.
